howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.description: Flick Goal is an exciting soccer shooting game where you control the ball with precise flicks. Swipe on the screen to determine the direction and power of your shot, and try to score goals past various obstacles and goalkeepers.

tips.title: Game Tips
tips.tip1: Control the power of your shot by the length of your swipe
tips.tip2: Aim for the corners of the goal to avoid the goalkeeper
tips.tip3: Watch out for moving obstacles that may block your shot
tips.tip4: Use curved shots to get around barriers
tips.tip5: Practice timing your shots when goalkeepers are moving

controller.title: Controls
controller.description: This game is designed for touch controls. On desktop, use your mouse to click and drag in the direction you want to shoot. On mobile devices, simply swipe on the screen to control your shots.

goal.question: What is the goal of the game?
goal.answer: The goal of Flick Goal is to score as many goals as possible by flicking the ball past obstacles and goalkeepers. Each level presents different challenges and setups that require precise aiming and power control.

levels.question: How do I unlock new levels?
levels.answer: New levels are unlocked by successfully completing the current level. Some special challenge levels require you to earn a minimum number of stars from previous levels.

mobile.question: Can I play on mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Yes, Flick Goal is fully optimized for mobile devices. The touch controls on smartphones and tablets provide an intuitive and responsive gaming experience.

multiplayer.question: Does the game have multiplayer mode?
multiplayer.answer: Currently, Flick Goal offers single-player challenges. You can compare your scores with friends through the leaderboard. The developers are considering adding multiplayer competition features in future updates.
